subject: Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
Football
Sports Injuries
Concussions
lead_paragraph: Ex-players who oppose the N.F.L.’s concussion settlement struggle with the knowledge that they are keeping payments from others with life-threatening conditions like A.L.S.
snippet: Ex-players who oppose the N.F.L.’s concussion settlement struggle with the knowledge that they are keeping payments from others with life-threatening conditions like A.L.S.
